name: Fen the Fox
description:
Controls:

Move: arrows

Jump: Z

Atack: X

A game by:

_____

A 8-bit game based on 80/90's era for Retrograde Game Jam 2.

_____

There are 2 downloads. You can download the Fen_the_fox.exe and play the game. Sadly, the right icon isn't set to it due to some godot problems. If you download Fen_the_fox.7z, extract and run the .exe with the .pck in the same directory. This file has the right custon icon. I'll upload the icon.ico since you can always make a shortcut and set a custon icon for the standalone executable. For any choosen file, the game will work fine.
